product_name: Hydro Flask Water Bottle Loop-Top Cap - Standard Mouth
long_description: The Hydro Flask Water Bottle Loop-Top cap provides a leakproof seal and helps keep the contents of your Hydro Flask bottle hot or cold. Clip a carabiner (sold separately) through the loop and attach your bottle to your backpack. Made from BPA-free polypropylene. Water Bottle Loop-Top cap fits Hydro Flask standard-mouth bottles (sold separately).
short_description: The Hydro Flask Water Bottle Loop-Top cap provides a leakproof seal and helps keep the contents of your Hydro Flask bottle hot or cold.
